Articles.Content:
So far it can barely get into L.K.O and has a few annoying problems, but I've completed one mission with it, but it's still extremely limited in its current state, anyone have any suggestions?

<a href="http://imgur.com/dF5eaVY"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/dF5eaVY.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com"/></a>

Edited March 22, 2014 by WindShieIds

Wrong code type, the forum uses BBC code. The awesome thing about imgur is you can dd albums like so.

Your Album:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

You just need the album identifier wrapped in [ imgur ] tabs (without the spaces)

Now, to answer your questions.

The actual shuttle is also limited, but you can save yourself some trouble by making your wings smaller and adding larger control surfaces on the outside.
Yea, I found it I didn't notice the code.
